title: Assistant Video Editor
summary: Marcom is the creatively-led global team that oversees Apple’s consumer facing marketing. We ensure the flawless development and execution of world-class communications across all medias and platforms. Every day, hundreds of millions of Apple customers around the world interact with our products. We drive the strategy and creative work that provide both new and existing customers with simple, engaging and inspiring marketing experiences.
description:
The Assistant Video Editor maintains a balanced and structured environment in the editing suite, while possessing the ability to closely collaborate with the editor from ideation through final delivery. Our assistant editors have technical, organizational and creative expertise in all aspects of post production and come to Apple to do the best work of their lives.

Responsibilities include:

Setting up editorial projects to studio specifications, importing/managing media, syncing footage, logging dailies, crating selects reels, recording scratch VO, editing rough assemblies and organizing timelines.
Formatting and generating VFX, Color and Audio prep with corresponding formats: EDL, XML, AAF, OMF and QT picture reference with burn-ins.
Supervising client sessions by taking notes, updating databases, creating dub lists, exporting cuts and posting to multiple destinations.
Performing basic compositing, tracking and rotoscoping.
Ability and willingness to work unpredictable long hours, late nights, weekends and holidays.
preferred_qualifications:
Expert level FCPX, Compressor and Adobe Premiere user.
Thorough understanding of the post production pipeline and interchange: Ingest, Offline, VFX, Color, Audio, CG, Conform and Export.
Deep knowledge of audio/video file formats, codecs, frame rates, resolutions, aspect ratios, compression schemes, color spaces, audio bit depths, sample rates and channel configurations.
Extraordinary communication and organization skills, great attention to detail and quality control with a team first attitude.
Ability to deliver results when it comes to hitting milestones and deadlines.
Highly organized with drive to create efficiencies and streamlined processes.
Can confidently build rapport, credibility and trust across multiple stakeholders - editors, creatives, producers, directors.
Experience in the following: broadcast, web and event deliverables.
